name: In Castle Walls 2023
description:
A witch character that has/can unlock abilities to solve a set of puzzles to figure out a mystery. To get to

new location the player must fight enemies.

Fire is strong against Electric

Electric is strong against Water

Water is strong against Fire

W – Forward

A – Left

S – Backward

D – Right

Left Click – Primary Attack

Right Click – Secondary Attack

Space – Switch Element

Tab – Open Inventory

 

Saharsh I. – Programmer

Zach R. – Programmer

Alan R. – Artist

Seamus W. – Artist
